name: OverRunZ
description:
OverRunZ is a 3D game where you play as a horde of zombies hunting down survivors. Control the horde through an abandoned office and reach the survivor before they kill all the zombies. Manoeuvre the horde through narrow spaces and destroyed rooms and chase the survivor until they end up in a deadlock where they finally meet their doom.

Controls

Use WASD to control the horde of zombies
